author: Makilore

text: Yeah, the DS one was just passible at best.  Three things were wrong: 1.  No voice acting, even crappy voice would be better than nothing.  2. Running used up health, it never had to before. 3. One couldn't target specific enemies during a fight, and the computer was really lousy at it.  At least it was better than Lunar Legends, though that's no challenge, that remake was only one thing, crap!  It was awful in every sense of the word, especially compared to the jewel of the game it remade.
